ObjectStates.Name: Custom_Tile
ObjectStates.LuaScript:
local PasserGuid =""
local RecieverGuid =""
local PasserBag
local RecieverBag
local ListenForPasser = false
local ListerForReciever = false
local ListenForScriptHolder = false
local ReadyToClone = false
local AddToExistingScript = false
local quantity
local RecieverExistingQuantity
local Clone = false
local LUAscript = ""
function onload()
  self.createButton({ click_function = 'LinkPasser',
                        label = "Link Bag with objects to get script",
                        function_owner = self,
                        position = {-1.9, 0.18, -1},
                        rotation = {0, 0, 0},
                        scale ={1,1,1},
                        width = 1600,
                        height = 100,
                        font_size = 100})

                        self.createButton({ click_function = 'Clicked',
                                              label = "Passer Display",
                                              function_owner = self,
                                              position = {0.5, 0.18, -1},
                                              rotation = {0, 0, 0},
                                              scale ={1,1,1},
                                              width = 700,
                                              height = 100,
                                              font_size = 100})

  self.createButton({ click_function = 'LinkReciever',
                        label = "Link Bag to hold objects ",
                        function_owner = self,
                        position = {-2, 0.18, 1},
                        rotation = {0, 0, 0},
                        scale ={1,1,1},
                        width = 1600,
                        height = 100,
                        font_size = 100})

                        self.createButton({ click_function = 'Clicked',
                                              label = "Reciever Display",
                                              function_owner = self,
                                              position = {0.5, 0.18, 1},
                                              rotation = {0, 0, 0},
                                              scale ={1,1,1},
                                              width = 800,
                                              height = 100,
                                              font_size = 100})
self.createButton({ click_function = 'StartClone',
                    label = "Ready",
                    function_owner = self,
                    position = {-2.5, 0.18, -0.5},
                    rotation = {0, 0, 0},
                    scale ={1,1,1},
                    width = 1300,
                    height = 100,
                    color = {r=1,g=0,b=0},
                    font_size = 100})

self.createButton({ click_function = 'Clicked',
                    label = "0%",
                    function_owner = self,
                    position = {-2.5, 0.18, 0},
                    rotation = {0, 0, 0},
                    scale ={1,1,1},
                    width = 1300,
                    height = 100,
                    font_size = 100})
self.createButton({ click_function = 'Reset',
                    label = "Reset",
                    function_owner = self,
                    position = {-3.3, 0.18, 0.5},
                    rotation = {0, 0, 0},
                    scale ={1,1,1},
                    width = 700,
                    height = 100,
                    color = {r=1,g=1,b=1},
                    font_size = 100})
                    self.createButton({ click_function = 'SetCloneStatus',
                                        label = "Clone?",
                                        function_owner = self,
                                        position = {-1.9, 0.18, 0.5},
                                        rotation = {0, 0, 0},
                                        scale ={1,1,1},
                                        width = 700,
                                        height = 100,
                                        color = {r=1,g=0,b=0},
                                        font_size = 100})

                                        self.createButton({ click_function = 'LinkScriptHolder',
                                                              label = "Link Object with Script ",
                                                              function_owner = self,
                                                              position = {-2, 0.18, 1.5},
                                                              rotation = {0, 0, 0},
                                                              scale ={1,1,1},
                                                              width = 1600,
                                                              height = 100,
                                                              font_size = 100})

                                                              self.createButton({ click_function = 'Clicked',
                                                                                    label = "Script Holder",
                                                                                    function_owner = self,
                                                                                    position = {0.5, 0.18, 1.5},
                                                                                    rotation = {0, 0, 0},
                                                                                    scale ={1,1,1},
                                                                                    width = 800,
                                                                                    height = 100,
                                                                                    font_size = 100})
end


function SetCloneStatus()
if Clone == false then
Clone = true
button_parameters ={}
button_parameters.index = 7
button_parameters.color = {r=0,g=1,b=0}
self.editButton(button_parameters)
else
  Clone = false
  button_parameters ={}
  button_parameters.index = 7
  button_parameters.color = {r=1,g=0,b=0}
  self.editButton(button_parameters)
end
end

function LinkPasser()
-- sets the guid of the passer and displays the name
  ListenForPasser = true
  ListenForReciever = false
  ListenForScriptHolder = false
  print("Drop The bag on the Inventory Cloner/Transfer")
end
function LinkReciever()
-- sets the guid of the Reciever and displays the name
ListenForPasser = false
ListenForReciever = true
ListenForScriptHolder = false
  print("Drop The bag on the Inventory Cloner/Transfer")
end
function LinkScriptHolder()
  ListenForPasser = false
  ListenForReciever = false
  ListenForScriptHolder = true
  print("Drop The object on the Inventory Cloner/Transfer")
end

function onCollisionEnter(collision_info)
 if collision_info.collision_object.tag ~= 'Surface' then
  if collision_info.collision_object.tag == 'Bag' then
      if ListenForPasser == true then
      PasserGuid = collision_info.collision_object.getGUID()
      PasserBag = getObjectFromGUID(PasserGuid)
      ListenForPasser = false
      button_parameters ={}
      button_parameters.index = 1
      button_parameters.label = collision_info.collision_object.getName()
      self.editButton(button_parameters)
    --  print(PasserGuid)
      end
      if ListenForReciever == true then
      RecieverGuid = collision_info.collision_object.getGUID()
      RecieverBag= getObjectFromGUID(RecieverGuid)
      button_parameters ={}
      button_parameters.index = 3
      button_parameters.label = collision_info.collision_object.getName()
      self.editButton(button_parameters)
      ListenForReciever = false
      --print(RecieverGuid)
      end
    end
  end
  if ListenForScriptHolder == true then
      LUAscript = collision_info.collision_object.getLuaScript()
      print(LUAscript)
      button_parameters ={}
      button_parameters.index = 9
      button_parameters.label = collision_info.collision_object.getName()
      self.editButton(button_parameters)
      ListenForScriptHolder = false
  end
    if PasserGuid ~= "" and RecieverGuid ~="" and LUAscript ~="" then
      --  print(PasserGuid)
    button_parameters ={}
    button_parameters.index = 4
    button_parameters.color = {r=0,g=1,b=0}
    self.editButton(button_parameters)
    ReadyToClone = true
    end
end


function StartClone()
  if ReadyToClone == true then
    -- set it to false so we dont get multipel instances running at the same time
    ReadyToClone = false
    quantity = PasserBag.getQuantity()-1
    RecieverExistingQuantity = RecieverBag.getQuantity()
    startLuaCoroutine(self,'CloneInventory')
end
end
function CloneInventory()

params={}
params.index = 0

for i =0,quantity do
  -- check if our quantity in bag is more than 0
  if PasserBag.getQuantity() >0 then

  TheObject = PasserBag.takeObject(params)

  coroutine.yield(0)

  -- if we want to clone the itmes do it
  if Clone == true then
    PasserBag.putObject(TheObject.clone())
  end
  TheObject.setLuaScript(LUAscript)
   RecieverBag.putObject(TheObject)
  UpdatProgress()
end

end
-- finished ready to start the coroutine again
  ReadyToClone = true
return 1
end
function UpdatProgress()
  ReciverCount = RecieverBag.getQuantity() - RecieverExistingQuantity
  PercentComplete = (ReciverCount / (quantity+1))*100

  button_parameters ={}
  button_parameters.index = 5
  button_parameters.label = math.ceil(PercentComplete) .."%"
  self.editButton(button_parameters)
end
function Reset()
   PasserGuid =""
   RecieverGuid =""
   PasserBag = nil
   RecieverBag = nil
   ListenForPasser = false
   ListerForReciever = false
   ReadyToClone = false
   quantity = 0
   Clone = false
   LUAscript = ""
   ListenForScriptHolder = false
  button_parameters ={}
  button_parameters.index = 1
  button_parameters.label = "Passer Display"
  self.editButton(button_parameters)
  button_parameters ={}
  button_parameters.index = 3
  button_parameters.label = "Reciever Display"
  self.editButton(button_parameters)
  button_parameters ={}
  button_parameters.index = 4
  button_parameters.color = {r=1,g=0,b=0}
  self.editButton(button_parameters)
  button_parameters ={}
  button_parameters.index = 5
  button_parameters.label = 0 .."%"
  self.editButton(button_parameters)
  button_parameters ={}
  button_parameters.index = 7
  button_parameters.color = {r=1,g=0,b=0}
  self.editButton(button_parameters)
  button_parameters ={}
  button_parameters.index = 9
  button_parameters.label ="Script Holder"
  self.editButton(button_parameters)
end








































--Space

ObjectStates.Name: BlockSquare
ObjectStates.LuaScript:
function one()print(self.name)end

function onLoad(save_state)
  one()
end
